course_title: Risk Communication and Community Engagement in Humanitarian Emergencies
class_notes: Students in CHE Certificate through March 29, all other MPH and MSPH students may enroll on April 1. Two-Day only class. Meets Saturday and Sunday 9/14 and 9/15 from 9:00am-5:00pm.
course_description: The objective of the course is to encourage and facilitate improved risk communication and community engagement (RCCE) during public health emergencies among public health authorities and partner organizations through the building of RCCE core capacities.
sections: Class Nbr: 1655, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: SaSu 9a-5p, Instructor: J. Smith, Status: Open
